Title: Innovation Session: Agents at work: Shaping the future of business | BRK1708
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
The rise of AI agents marks a turning point in how organizations operate. These agents donâ€™t just work individually to automate tasks â€”they collaborate, orchestrate processes, and adapt dynamically to business needs. Preparing for that agentic future means rethinking roles, processes, and the very architecture of your business. Enterprise-grade platforms will be critical to this functional transformation, providing the security, compliance, and scalability needed to deploy agents responsibly and at scale. Join us to discover what this shift means for your organization and how to start preparing today.
